0.name: Introduction
0.startMsg:
#Stranger# Oh, hello there...=>
			#Stranger# Uhm... I haven't seen you here before, who are you?=>
			#Stranger# Well, to be honest, it doesn't matter. Not in this place.=>
			#Richard# My name is... uhm... Dick, but I don't really like it. Call me Richard.=>
			#Richard# You seem lost... You know what? If you can prove you can be of any use, then we'll talk.=>
			#Richard# Can you please bring me some wood for the campfire? Here's an axe, it'll help you.=>
			#Richard# Return to me when you get 15 wood pieces.=>
			* You can gather wood by taking axe in your hands (open inventory with E key and left click the axe), approaching a tree and hitting enter or clicking it a few times.=>
			* You can also interact with trees with your bare hands, then you'll get another kind of resource.
0.endMsg:
#Richard# Thanks a lot, stranger.=>
		#Richard# I'd like to know your name now...=>
		#Richard# Nice to meet you, {PLAYER}!=>
		#Richard# Here, take these berries. You earned them. =>
		#Richard# Hm... well, you can also take my axe as a reward. I didn't use it anyway. If you want some job or a good story, just ask!

1.name: Crafting tutorial
1.startMsg:
#Richard# So, {PLAYER}, you liked using that axe, huh? [Uhh...]=>
		#Richard# Guess what, I can show you how to make one yourself. You can even make other great tools that'll help you in this cruel world. [I'm interested]=>
		#Richard# Well, let me remember... Ah! Bring me some small rocks. 10 of them, to be more specific. You can find them near boulders. It won't be easy to gather them with your bare hands, but it's worth it, trust me!=>
		* To gather small rocks, approach a boulder and interact with it.
1.endMsg:
#Richard# That's what I'm talking about!=>
		#Richard# So, to make a tool or really anything you can imagine you need to gather ingredients for it first.=>
		#Richard# Or you can just buy a recipe from crafts master, but it's more fullfilling to figure out the recipe yourself, isn't it?=>
		#Richard# Well, I did my part, you did yours. If you need something - just ask! Bye!=>
		* To figure out a recipe, you need to gather some resources and open "craft" menu from inventory. If you find new resources that can be used in some recipe, a new entry will appear on the craft screen as well as the notification in the game log.=>
		* For example, if you gather some sticks and small rocks, you'll unlock a couple of new recipes. Go try it out.=>
		#Richard# Oh... I didn't give you any reward? You can have my leftover birthday cake, it even still has candles in it! [Ugh... Cool... Thanks?]
1.reqMsg: #Richard# Have you gathered those 10 small rocks I asked you for yet?

2.name: New tableware
2.startMsg:
#Richard# Oi, {PLAYER}! I need your help again. [What do you need this time?]=>
		#Richard# I need some clay to make myself new tableware because I broke every single dish when I was drunk yesterday... [I'm sorry for your... Uhm... Loss.]=>
		#Richard# Yeah, that sucks. You know how to dig things up don't you? [Of course! (I actually don't)]=>
		* To dig something up from the ground you need a tool. To be more specific - a shovel.=>
		* You can make one from sticks and small rocks. Just gather them, open your inventory, then craft menu and craft a stone shovel.=>
		* Then you need to find Flint and Clay somewhere.
		When you find a thing to dig up, just take your shovel to your hand, stand on the tile that contains the item you want to dig up
		and press the button that appears on the screen. Alternatively, you can use "U" button on the keyboard.=>
		#Richard# Hmmm... I believe you. Okay, dig up 5 flint and 5 clay pieces and bring them to me.
2.endMsg:
#Richard# Thanks, brother! I'm beginning to think that I might even invite you to our faction... [Your faction?]=>
		#Richard# Yeah, I'm a member of "The Partisans of The Dead Lands" faction. What a pretentious name, don't you think? [Meh]=>
		#Richard# So... Let's talk about this later. I need to contact our leader about you.
2.reqMsg: #Richard# Bring me 5 flint and 5 clay pieces.
2.journalText: Bring 5 flint and 5 clay to Richard

3.name: The Dungeon
3.startMsg:
#Richard# Listen, {PLAYER}, yesterday I heard some loud noises from underground. I think it's the dungeon. Again. [Dungeon?]=>
		#Richard# Oh well, I forgot you didn't remember anything... I'll explain later. What's important now is the key's location. [A key? To the dungeon?]=>
		#Richard# Yeah, I kinda know about where to find one. But only a general location... [So... Where is it?]=>
		#Richard# It's somewhere one sector North from here... (5, 6), to be more accurate. You'll have to search the whole sector for it. [I guess I have no choice...]=>
		#Richard# You're right, {PLAYER}. You can't even imagine what would happen if monsters were to escape from the dungeon again.=>
		* To travel between unexplored sectors, you need a Travelling Kit.=>
		#Richard# Oh, yeah, here's my last travel kit. You won't make it to (5, 6) without it. [Thanks]=>
		You need to find the key as soon as possible.[I'll do my best]=>
		#Richard# I believe in you. So head to the sector (5, 6) and find the dungeon key!=>
		#Richard# And... here - take these vegetables. You don't want to starve to death while searching for the key, do you? [Thanks]=>
		* To move to the next sector you need to approach the edge of the current one and press "N" when a prompt in the game log appears.
3.endMsg:
#Richard# That's excellent news, {PLAYER}. Here's your reward: 80 coins. It's not much, but you might need them if you meet any traders in the dungeon.=>
		#Richard# Oh... You need some kind of weapon? Take this. [A toy sword? Duh.]=>
		#Richard# Talk to me again as soon as possible and I'll explain you how to enter the dungeon!
3.reqMsg: #Richard# You are still here? Head to the sector (5, 6) and retrieve the dungeon key! Hurry!
3.journalText: Find the dungeon key at the sector (5, 6)

4.name: Entrance to the Dungeon
4.startMsg:
#Richard# It's finally the time for you to go to the dungeon, {PLAYER}. [I'm kinda nervous]=>
		#Richard# Well, don't worry. By doing this you'll save us both![Both? What about your faction?]=>
		#Richard# Oh... Uhmm... It's a long story, but the thing is... I got lost. [What?!] =>
		#Richard# The last thing I remember was crossing the desert with my group. Then a bright flash and complete darkness afterwards. When I finally regained consciousness, I was here. My group was nowhere to be seen. All my equipment - gone. I was wandering desperately for a few weeks and then decided to set up a camp here. [So how long has it been?]=>
		#Richard# Since I'm here all alone? About half a year. I can't tell exactly. But hey, when you appeared here out of nowhere you definitely gave me some more hope! We will escape this place. But first, if the dungeon releases its beasts, we'll be dead in no time. So back to the dungeon stuff. [Okay]=>
		#Richard# So, you must find an entrance to the dungeon. It looks like a trapdoor, and, well, it is. It's locked, but now that you have the key - it's not a problem.=>
		#Richard# When you open the trapdoor, just carefully climb down to the dungeon. [Understood]=>
		* To go underground, you have to unlock dungeon trapdoor and then stand on a "hole in the ground" tile and press "use" button or the on-screen pop-up button. => 
		#Richard# Almost forgot, here you go - my last Dungeon Search scroll. Take it. Use it to find the Dungeon Entrance. Good luck, {PLAYER}! =>
		* To use a scroll, open your inventory, click on it with RMB and press "Use" button.=>
		#Richard# I'll be waiting for you here. If you survive - bring me some trophies... Yes! Bring me 10 leather pieces you get from the monsters you kill there.
4.endMsg: #Richard# Thank you, {PLAYER}! Take your reward and return to me when you are ready for the next task.
4.reqMsg: #Richard# Kill at least 10 rats and give me 10 leather pieces you get from them.

5.name: Beer
5.startMsg:
#Richard# Yo {PLAYER}! It's kinda hot in here. I'd reeeally love to have some beer right now. [What are you, alcoholic?]=>
		#Richard# Meh, say what you want about me, but bring me a pint of beer. I'll pay you 10 coins for it. Deal?[Okay]=>
		* You can craft beer using sour and spicy leaves which can be gathered from bushes. [Cool]
5.endMsg: #Richard# Nice job, {PLAYER}. Here are your coins.
5.reqMsg: #Richard# Where's my beer? Bring me my beer! Now!
5.journalText: Craft a pint of beer for Richard

6.name: Farming tutorial
6.startMsg:
#Old farmer# Greetings, young man! What's your name? {PLAYER}? Hmmm... Tell me, {PLAYER}, do you want to know about farming crops? [Yes?]=>
		#Old farmer# Then I'll teach you everything you'll ever need to know to become the greatest farmer ever!
			First of all, you need to plow a couple of tiles of soil. You can do it with a hoe while standing on a grass tile.[Please, continue]=>
		#Old farmer# After that, you need something to plant into the soil: some kind of seeds. I'll give you a handful of some seeds so that you can train on them. [Thanks]=>
		#Old farmer# And then you plant your seeds while standing on a plowed soil tile and wait until your crops fully grow. [And that's it?]=>
		#Old farmer# Yeah, it's that simple. Go try it out and bring me 3 tomatoes once they grow. [Understood]
6.endMsg: #Old farmer# Well done! You are going to be a great farmer... someday! Take these potato seeds as a reward.
6.journalText: Grow and harvest crops from seeds Old farmer gave you and bring 3 tomatoes to him.

7.name: Toughening up
7.startMsg:
#Richard# Hey, {PLAYER}! I don't think you are ready to go to the dungeon just yet. I need to show you something. [Huh?]=>
		#Richard# Here - you can build a sewing machine and make yourself some clothes from plant fiber. They'll protect you from monsters you'll meet in the dungeon.[Understood]=>
		* To build a sewing machine, open Build Menu and click on the Sewing Machine button (once you collect all the needed resources) [Ok]=>
		#Richard# Hmm... Then, craft at least a Plant Fiber Shirt and talk to me again. See ya.
7.endMsg: #Richard# Whoa, this shirt looks nice on you, {PLAYER}. Now you are 100% ready to kick some monster ass. I'm proud of you.
7.reqMsg: #Richard# Build a sewing machine and craft at least a Plant Fiber Shirt.
7.journalText: Build a sewing machine and craft at least a Plant Fiber Shirt

8.name: Farm animals tutorial
8.startMsg:
#Old farmer# {PLAYER}, today I'll teach you about farm animals. =>
		#Old farmer# You must've seen some chickens and cows walking around here. So, you can feed them some hay and they will produce something for you: cows will produce milk, chikens will give you some eggs and so on.[Cool]=>
		#Old farmer# To get hay you must build a Wheelbarrow first, but if you don't have one already, I'll give you some hay to test things out. [Thanks]=>
		#Old farmer# Well, go feed some cows and bring me 3 milk bottles. The rest is yours.
8.endMsg: #Old farmer# Nice. Nothing beats some fresh milk... in the middle of nowhere. See you soon, {PLAYER}.
8.journalText: Feed some cows and bring 3 milk bottles to the Old Farmer.
